original_text: They recorded the names of all the men who were 20 years old or older. Those men could fight in the army. They recorded the names of the men in each clan and family. Reuben was the firstborn son of Israel, so they recorded his tribe first. These were the numbers of the men from each tribe:
korean_text: 납달리 지파에서 계수된 자는 오만 삼천사백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: They recorded the names of all the men
who were 20 years old or older
Those men could fight in the army
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자들은 군대에서 싸울 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They recorded the names of the men
Reuben was the firstborn son of Israel
so they recorded his tribe first
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그의 지파를 먼저 기록했습니다

sentences.original_text: These were the numbers of the men
